Leta Capital

Leta Capital is an entrepreneur-friendly venture capital firm focused on delivering high returns by financing IT and new technology improvements. They invest in scalable businesses with proven revenue generation, often overlooking entrepreneurs bypassed by mainstream VCs due to origin or other factors.

Offices: Grand Cayman (Cayman Islands)

Investment Stages: Seed, Series A

Markets: Business analytics, big data analysis, AI technologies, VR/AR/XR, optimization and automation of processes, B2B-software, B2C-software

Founded Year: 2012

Investor Type: Venture Capital

Portfolio Companies: inDrive, Novakid, 365Scores, Buddy AI, Synthesis AI, Prodly, UNIGINE, Affise, Devar, eTribez, Gaviti, IntelliBoard, Double Data, Qmarkets, viisights, Wakie, ShapesXR, Whizz, Weezmo, Brain4Net, Unomy, Vicomi, RedHelper, Bright Box, rollApp, DisplAir

Website: https://www.leta.vc

Team Page: https://www.leta.vc/team-all/team

Portfolio Link: https://www.leta.vc/portfolio

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/3031457

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LetaCapital

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/leta_capital/

Crunchbase: https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/leta-capital

Pitchbook: https://pitchbook.com/profiles/investor/57722-95
